SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_user (id, user_name, user_password, user_email, create_time, user_info, user_img) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{userImg,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
mapper.update: update sys_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_info = #{userInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, user_img = #{userImg,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, user_password, user_email, create_time, user_info, user_img from sys_user
